General.Name: Nextronics Engineering
General.Description: Nextronics Engineering Corp. provides connectors, thermal, backplane, and subracks for medical, aerospace, transportation, industry, and communication applications in Taiwan. The company offers high speed I/O, circular, backplane signal, and combo power connectors; and embedded system connectors and components. It also provides terminal blocks; press-fit machine and tooling products; and customized-solutions, including high speed, circular, RF coax, D-shaped, rectangular, and automotive connectors, as well as embedded systems; and compact PCI, ATCA, and AMC and Micro TCA product solutions. The company was founded in 1986 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 31, Kang Ning Street, New Taipei City, Taiwan
